name: 2022 13th International Conference on E-Education, E-Business, E-Management and E-Learning（IC4E 2022）
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted excellent papers will be published in IC4E 2022 conference proccedings, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and sent to be indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science) IC4E 2022 ISBN: 978-1-4503-8718-7
